name: visibility-enable
description: When Bluetooth technology is enabled, it should be possible to make the device visible by other Bluetooth devices.
pre_condition:
- Bluetooth technology is enabled (Bluetooth switcher is toggled on 'I')
- Visibility switcher is toggled on 'O' or 'OFF' in the Bluetooth applet and in the Bluetooth panel

steps.description: Click on the Bluetooth applet icon
steps.expected: Menu of the Bluetooth applet appears

steps.description: Click on the visibility switcher to make the device visible by other Bluetooth devices
steps.expected: Visibility switcher is toggled on 'I'. Visibility switcher of Bluetooth panel is toggled on 'ON'.

steps.description: Take a mobile phone (for example) and try to search for the Bluetooth service of the laptop
steps.expected: Bluetooth service of the laptop should appear in the list of the available Bluetooth services.

author: zingile

name: visibility-disable
description: When Bluetooth technology is enabled, it should be possible to make the device not visible by other Bluetooth devices.
pre_condition:
- Bluetooth technology is enabled (Bluetooth activation switcher is toogled on 'ON')
- Visibility switcher is toggled on 'I' or 'ON' in the Bluetooth applet and in the Bluetooth panel

steps.expected: Window of the Bluetooth panel appears

steps.description: Click on the visibility switcher to make the device not visible by other Bluetooth devices
steps.expected: Visibility switcher is toggled on 'OFF'. Visibility switcher of Bluetooth applet is toggled on 'O'.

steps.description: Take a mobile phone (for example) and try to search for the Bluetooth service of the laptop
steps.expected: Bluetooth service of the laptop shouldn't appear in the list of the available bluetooth services.

author: zingile
